title: Combining Deep Speaker Specific Representations with GMM-SVM for Speaker Verification
excerpt: This study combines a Gaussian mixture model support vector machine (GMM-SVM) system with a nonlinear feature transformation, discriminatively trained to extract speaker specific features from MFCCs. Separation of the speaker information component and non-speaker  ...
